Scene:
Kampei's Suicide
(Kampei harakiri / 勘平腹切)

Play: The League of the 47 Ronin (仮名手本忠臣蔵)

Production: October 1972

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Tokutayū (豊竹十九大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kizaemon II (野澤喜左衛門 (二))
